Annotation.String: Able to log into the service and read resources.
Able to configure Users and their Accounts.
Able to change the password for the current user Account.
Able to configure components managed by this service.
OEM Get operations privileges may be defined on a Link element to provide read privileges for the referenced resources, or on individual elements to override the privileges for that element
OEM Post privileges may be defined on a Link element to provide create privileges for the referenced resources, or on individual elements to override the privileges for that element
OEM PatchPut privileges may be defined on a Link element to provide update privileges for the referenced resources, or on individual elements to override the privileges for that element
OEM Delete privileges may be defined on a Link element to provide update privileges for the referenced resources, or on individual elements to override the privileges for that element
